keywordDescription.min-content: Sets the width to the minimum size needed to fit the content
keywordDescription.max-content: Sets the width to the maximum size allowed by the content
keywordDescription.fit-content: The width expands to fit the content
keywordDescription.initial: Sets the width to its initial value
keywordDescription.inherit: The width is inherited from the parent element
keywordDescription.calc: This function in CSS allows you to perform calculations to determine the value of a property the expr can include ( + , - , * , / ) operators

maxWidth.description: Sets the maximum width of an element

minWidth.description: Sets the minimum width of an element

width.description: The width property is used to set the horizontal width of an element's content area.

keywordDescription.min-content: Sets the height to the minimum size needed to fit the content
keywordDescription.max-content: Sets the height to the maximum size allowed by the content
keywordDescription.fit-content: The height expands to fit the content
keywordDescription.initial: Sets the height to its initial value
keywordDescription.inherit: The height is inherited from the parent element
keywordDescription.calc: This function in CSS allows you to perform calculations to determine the value of a property the expr can include + , - , * , / operators

maxHeight.description: Sets the maximum height of an element

minHeight.description: Sets the minimum height of an element

height.description: The height property is used to set the vertical height of an element's content area.
